entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Chetwynd
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening and ending before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
